value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.20985v1", "title": "Acylindrically hyperbolic groups and counting problems", "summary": "We show that Morse elements are generic in acylindrically hyperbolic groups.\nAs an application, we observe that fully irreducible outer automorphisms are\ngeneric in the outer automorphism group of a finite-rank free group.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR,math.GT", "published": "2025-04-29T17:55:53Z"}
